text: Hey <@U7SL518D6>! do you know whether there is a formal transition between CMS and Content Hub? Wanted to try new functionality, and HubSpot asked me to upgrade to Content Hub Pro, but we already have a CMS Hub Enterprise license?

Hi :slightly_smiling_face: Does anyone know whether there is a formal transition between CMS and Content Hub? Wanted to try new functionality, and HubSpot asked me to upgrade to Content Hub Pro, but we already have a CMS Hub Enterprise license?

Many of Content Hub’s features are not available directly in CMS Hub and an upgrade is required to get it. That said that doesn’t mean you are necessarily paying more.
For example Memberships is available in the Pro tier of Content Hub, whereas it was only available in CMS Hub Enterprise. Pricing at HubSpot also takes seats into account now days.
